pages.title: Silver Arowana
pages.text: The silver arowana ($(o)Osteoglossum bicirrhosum$()) is a South American freshwater bony fish of the family Osteoglossidae.

pages.title: Silver Arowana
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
